title: Project skin (Jinx)
body: 1. * Im a jinx main and i really want a project skin because it is so awesome~ğŸ˜œğŸ˜ but the thing is there is no project jinx.... (sobğŸ˜¢sob) {{champion:222}} so please riot give it a try

replies.body:
Nah, it wouldn't suit her.

I use to main Jinx, and I own all her skins. She really does have quite a diverse range of skins, so I'm sure there is atleast one which you will like. 

Tbh I think Arcade Jinx could look pretty cool, where her ultimate is like that giant bullet from the mario games, that would be sick.
